contract_details.description: Comprehensive configuration file consolidation focusing on eliminating duplicate configurations, standardizing formats, creating unified configuration management, and ensuring configuration consistency across the entire system.
contract_details.background: Following code quality cleanup success, Agent-3's configuration management expertise is perfectly suited to tackle the pervasive configuration duplication and inconsistency issues that create maintenance and deployment challenges.
objectives: Audit all configuration files for duplication and redundancy
Consolidate duplicate configurations into unified sources
Standardize configuration formats and validation schemas
Implement automated configuration validation and consistency checking
Establish configuration versioning and deployment protocols
deliverables: Unified configuration repository with eliminated duplication
Standardized configuration formats with validation schemas
Automated configuration validation and consistency checking
Configuration documentation and best practices guide
technical_requirements: Configuration analysis and duplication detection tools
Schema validation frameworks (JSON Schema, YAML validation)
Configuration management systems (hierarchical config, environment overrides)
Automated validation and consistency checking frameworks
Version control integration for configuration management
success_criteria: Configuration duplication reduced by 80% through consolidation
All configurations follow standardized formats and schemas
Automated validation catches 95% of configuration inconsistencies
Configuration versioning and deployment protocols implemented
Configuration documentation provides clear usage guidelines

resources_required: Configuration analysis tools (config parsers, duplication detection)

contract_history.details: Configuration consolidation contract created for eliminating duplication and establishing configuration consistency
